property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If there is a spell from among them, you may return one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone to its owner's hand, then you may add one of the revealed spells to your hand. If there is a cross gear among them, you may return a card in your opponent's mana zone to its owner's hand, then you may add one of the revealed cross gear to your hand. Then put the rest of on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 9000 or less and destroy them. Then for each creature destroyed in this way, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This cross gear is put into your mana zone tapped) ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +6000 power and breaks an additional shield. ■ When the crossed creature would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. ■ Samurai Magic (When you generate this card and you have a Samurai creature in the battle zone, search your deck. You may put a 'Flowing Gear - Dancing Twin Lion Fangs' from it into the battle zone for no cost. Then shuffle your deck.)

card.name: Master of Destiny, the Spirit Wolf Phoenix

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Samurai creatures and one of your Knight creatures. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell that has "Shield trigger" from your mana zone for no cost. Then you may put a cross gear from your mana zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cross one of your cross gear in the battle zone to this creature for no cost. ■ When this creature is added to your hand from the shield zone, if you have a cross gear in the battle zone this creature gets "Shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.) ■ Your opponent can't return spells from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets "blocker". ■ The crossed creature untaps at the end of each of your turns.

property.name: Rules

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following: ► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost: ► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Each card put into your hand from the shield fortified with this castle gets "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. If that creature is a God, destroy another of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Whenever your opponent's creatures attack and aren't blocked, after the attack destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your other Shinobis in the battle zone gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature battles, your opponent chooses a card in your hand at random. If that card is a creature, that creature's power is added to this creature's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +4000 power and has "blocker". ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {KNIGHT MAGIC} (If you have a Knight in the battle zone, you may use this spell's Knight Magic ability once more.) Each of your creatures in the battle zone has "power attacker +3000" and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least one other Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, untap one of your creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules

When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +1500 power. ■ Cross gear may be crossed with the crossed creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a castle into your shields, you may draw a card or choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your creatures. Then put that creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, draw 3 cards. Then put 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SAMURAI GENERATION} (When you put this creature, you may generate a cross gear from your hand for no cost.) ■ Each of your crossed creatures gets "slayer". (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard a non-creature card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power and all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone get -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you cast a spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has "blocker". That creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {KNIGHT MAGIC} (If you have a Knight in the battle zone, you may use this spell's Knight Magic ability once more.) Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may reduce the summoning cost of this creature by 1 for each spell in your mana zone. It can't cost less than 1. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Giants may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. {SAVER}: Giant (When one of your Giant(s) would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CASTLE} —Choose one of your shields and attach this card to fortify that shield. When that fortified shield leaves your shields, put this card into your graveyard. (Use "Shield Trigger" abilities before putting this card into your graveyard.) ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Samurai creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each castle in your shields you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down and choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. ■ When this creature is added to your hand from your shields and you have a castle in your shields, this creature gets "shield trigger". {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players unless crossed with a cross gear.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal a Samurai or Cross Gear in your hand. If you don't, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power for each cross gear crossed with the crossed creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a card in your opponent's graveyard and put it on the bottom of their deck. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature blocks, you may draw a card. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put a creature, a spell, cross gear, and castle into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your Samurai creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses a card in your shields and reveals it. If it's a non-evolution Samurai, you may put it into the battle zone. If it's not, you may put that card into your graveyard. If you do, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your cross gear in the battle zone into your graveyard. If you do, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has the lowest power. If there are 2 or more creatures that have the lowest power, choose one of them and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, if your opponent has 3 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other Knights in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.value: ■ If you have a spell in your graveyard, this creature gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.value: ■ Whenever you cast a spell, this creature gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power until the end of the turn.

They can't cost less than 1. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules

When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +12000 power. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, until the end of the attack, that creature may get "Galaxy breaker" (A creature that has Galaxy breaker breaks all your opponent's shields. After the attack, break all your shields.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution: Put on top of 2 of your Angel Commands and/or Dragons. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks for the first time this turn, you may put up to 2 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you put a Dragon into your graveyard this way, untap this creature. If you put an Angel Command into your graveyard this way, when this creature would be destroyed this turn, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Dragons and/or Knights. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast any number of fire or darkness spells from your graveyard that have total cost 7 or less. Then put those spells on the bottom of your deck in any order. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution: Put on top of 2 of your Angel Commands and/or Dragons. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks for the first time this turn, you may put up to 2 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you put a Dragon into your graveyard this way, untap this creature. If you put an Angel Command into your graveyard this way, when this creature would be destroyed this turn, it stays in the battle zone instead.
